reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Investire nelle infrastrutture scolastiche per garantire opportunità educative di qualità ai minori in età scolare in Libano (Fase II).

description.narrative: L'iniziativa intende contribuire al Programma UNICEF RACE Programma RACE (Reaching all Children with Education), con l'obiettivo di migliorare l'accesso a servizi educativi di qualità per tutti i bambini e giovani in età scolare presenti in Libano

the project contributes to address the specific needs identified in the Education sector, in line with the policies defined by the Lebanese government in the RACE 2 Programme. The project will implement rehabilitation works in seven Lebanese public schools, in order to make them adequate to accommodate a higher number of students compared to the school years preceding the Syrian crisis, and to make the structures suitable for including boys, girls and people with disabilities. The planned activities strengthen the capacities of the public education system and improve the access of refugee and Lebanese children to the formal education system.
